titles.title: A bill to amend the Plant Protection Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into cooperative agreements with States to augment the efforts of the States to conduct early detection and surveillance to prevent the establishment or spread of plant pests that endanger agriculture, the environment, and the economy of the United States, and for other purposes.
Early Plant Pest Detection and Surveillance Improvement Act
Early Plant Pest Detection and Surveillance Improvement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Early Plant Pest Detection and Surveillance Improvement Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into a cooperative agreement with any state department of agriculture that agrees to conduct early plant pest detection surveillance activities, including inspection and surveillance of domestic plant shipments between a state and other states.
